overview:
Yorick Vince is the Founder and CEO of SimpleDifferent, a company based in Thailand developing the SimpleDifferent web CMS.

With SimpleDifferent, Yorick Vince invented a completely new Graphical User Interface and User Experience to help anybody, from the computer illiterate to the professional webmaster, create clear and efficient websites.

Yorick Vince has been a successful graphic designer, ergonomist, and professional photographer for more than 20 years. He was the art director and the chief ergonomist for 01net.com, the leading french speaking IT website.
